definitions.definition: To cut ( food ) almost entirely in half and spread the halves apart , in a shape suggesting the wings of a butterfly .
examples: Butterfly the chicken before you grill it.

definitions.definition: To cut strips of surgical tape or plasters into thin strips , and place across (a gaping wound ) to close it.

To cause events after the point of divergence to not happen as they did in real history , and people conceived after the point of divergence to not exist in recognizable form, due to the random variations introduced by the butterfly effect .
examples: Pearl Harbor not happening would've butterflied Taylor Swift.
labels: of the point of divergence of an alternate history scenario
definitions.label_groups: transitive , of the point of divergence of an alternate history scenario

main_definition: ( transitive ) To cut ( food ) almost entirely in half and spread the halves apart , in a shape suggesting the wings of a butterfly .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To cut strips of surgical tape or plasters into thin strips , and place across (a gaping wound ) to close it.

( transitive , of the point of divergence of an alternate history scenario ) To cause events after the point of divergence to not happen as they did in real history , and people conceived after the point of divergence to not exist in recognizable form, due to the random variations introduced by the butterfly effect .
